Pacers Improve To 16-1 At Home
The Pacers went on a 18-0 run in the third quarter en route to a 99-82 win over the Pelicans.Tags: Paul George

VIDEO PLAYLIST

    Pacers Improve To 16-1 At Home
    The Pacers went on a 18-0 run in the third quarter en route to a 99-82 win over the Pelicans.Tags: Paul George
  • Heat Put Away Magic
    Heat Put Away Magic
    Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh combined to score 40 points as the Heat defeated the Magic 110-94.Tags: Heat, Magic
  • Nets Win Second Straight
    Nets Win Second Straight
    Deron Williams scored 21 points as the Nets captured consecutive wins for just the second time this season with a 89-82 victory over the Cavs.Tags: Deron Williams, Paul Pierce
  • Paul Out 3-5 Weeks With Shoulder Injury
    Paul Out 3-5 Weeks With Shoulder Injury
    Chris Broussard discusses Clippers guard Chris Paul's shoulder injury against the Mavericks, which could keep him out of Los Angeles' lineup for 3-5 weeks.Tags: NBA, Clippers, Chris Paul, Chris Broussard
